actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to refer S. 740 entitled "A bill for the relief of Inslaw, Inc., and William A. Hamilton and Nancy Burke Hamilton" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 740 (a bill for the relief of a named corporation and two named individuals) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 740 entitled "A bill for the relief of Inslaw, Inc., and William A. Hamilton and Nancy Burke Hamilton" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
